title: Rise Again: The Tale of Xu Yunlong
overview: Business prodigy Xu Yunlong is highly loved within the group, which arouses the jealousy of Zhang Feng, the son of the chairman of the board of directors. In order to successfully take over the throne, Zhang Feng induced Xu Yunlong's beloved wife to betray her husband, and teamed up with him to set up a scheme to discredit Xu Yunlong. After being tortured in all kinds of ways, Zhang Feng was thrown into the river bottom. However, destiny was clear, and Xu Yunlong escaped by chance. From then on, he changed his name to "Wu Ergou" and started from scratch as a beggar's son-in-law in a noodle shop. He cheated and counterattacked all the way in the business world, vowing to defeat Zhang Feng and make a comeback!
